short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bathroom Filters allow you to filter properties by the number of bathrooms on Rightmove.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wondering why you can't filter by bathrooms on Rightmove? 

Me too!

So I created this Chrome extension to do just that.

Now you can speed up your property search by filtering by bathrooms, just like you do with bedrooms!
